entry.source: {F812}Aniel\0{F87A,-17}{F813,0,697000}Ah, my thanks for coming. It would{F801}seem that you have accepted the quest{F801}in question.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697001}I shall call for Sister Gabby.{F801}Please wait a moment.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Aniel\0{F87A,-17}{F813,0,697000}Ah, my thanks for coming. It would{F801}seem that you have accepted the quest{F801}in question.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697001}I shall call for Sister Gabby.{F801}Please wait a moment.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,697002}So, you have accepted our task,{F801}honorable warrior of light.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,697002}So, you have accepted our task,{F801}honorable warrior of light.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Aniel\0{F87A,-17}{F813,1,465003}It appears that Azazel is deep within{F801}Kiccigiorgi Forest.{F801}{F802}We are counting on you to eliminate{F801}him, honorable Samurai.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Aniel\0{F87A,-17}{F813,1,465003}It appears that Azazel is deep within{F801}Kiccigiorgi Forest.{F801}{F802}We are counting on you to eliminate{F801}him, honorable Samurai.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 There is something standing near{F801}the cliff...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 There is something standing near{F801}the cliff...{F801}

entry.source: Take a closer look{F801}Keep your distance{F801}
entry.target: Take a closer look{F801}Keep your distance{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-959}{F813,0,697006}A child of man... Or, perhaps, a mere{F801}puppet taking one's shape...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697007}My name is Azazel. Here, I bestow{F801}knowledge upon children of men.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-959}{F813,0,697006}A child of man... Or, perhaps, a mere{F801}puppet taking one's shape...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697007}My name is Azazel. Here, I bestow{F801}knowledge upon children of men.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Azazel\0{F87A,-959}{F813,0,697008}There is no need to say anything.{F801}I know why you are here.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697009}You have ceased to think for yourself,{F801}and only act as the angels wish you{F801}to. You have come to slay me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697010}You would interfere with my plans,{F801}even though you are a child of man...{F801}Such a pitiful existence.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Azazel\0{F87A,-959}{F813,0,697008}There is no need to say anything.{F801}I know why you are here.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697009}You have ceased to think for yourself,{F801}and only act as the angels wish you{F801}to. You have come to slay me.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697010}You would interfere with my plans,{F801}even though you are a child of man...{F801}Such a pitiful existence.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,697011}Splendid work on slaying the demon,{F801}O honorable warrior of light.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697012}So Azazel was bestowing knowledge to{F801}people... Just as Lilith had done{F801}before.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697013}It is true that knowledge will set{F801}people free.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697014}But, this freedom also causes{F801}suffering.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697015}Freedom does not necessarily lead to{F801}salvation.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697016}The Lord's guidance is crucial for the{F801}people to have happiness. That is the{F801}path the Lord has ordained.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697017}You must protect the Lord's will as{F801}well. We are all counting on you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,697011}Splendid work on slaying the demon,{F801}O honorable warrior of light.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697012}So Azazel was bestowing knowledge to{F801}people... Just as Lilith had done{F801}before.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697013}It is true that knowledge will set{F801}people free.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697014}But, this freedom also causes{F801}suffering.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697015}Freedom does not necessarily lead to{F801}salvation.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697016}The Lord's guidance is crucial for the{F801}people to have happiness. That is the{F801}path the Lord has ordained.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697017}You must protect the Lord's will as{F801}well. We are all counting on you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,697003}I have taken the form of Gabby to make{F801}this request, so I shall keep it while{F801}speaking to you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697004}I hear that the demon I wish slain,{F801}Azazel, is in Kiccigiorgi Forest.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697005}I have no doubt that a warrior of{F801}light such as yourself will have no{F801}problems. I await your return.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Gabby\0{F87A,11}{F813,0,697003}I have taken the form of Gabby to make{F801}this request, so I shall keep it while{F801}speaking to you.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697004}I hear that the demon I wish slain,{F801}Azazel, is in Kiccigiorgi Forest.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,697005}I have no doubt that a warrior of{F801}light such as yourself will have no{F801}problems.
